entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Wynyard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:25 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wynyard 07:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -14.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -16.7°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
